title: Worst Date Wednesday: He Told Her He Got WHAT the Night Before?
description: "Amy" emails about an awful date that started with him inviting her over so they could "figure out what they wanted to do".  She wore a white dress that got ruined by his dirty truck.  He drank a significant amount of beers before attempting to figure out a plan.  And then proceeded to tell her about what happened the night before with another woman....
